TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Reminders implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._Reminders, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ReminderCollectionEvents_Event

summary.span: 包含的所有集合Microsoft Outlook 应用程序中的对象，表示所有挂起项目的提醒。

span.span: Contains a collection of all the objects in a Microsoft Outlook application that represent the reminders for all pending items.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 使用对象的属性可返回Reminders集合。

span.span: Use the object's property to return the Reminders collection.

para.span: 使用Reminders()，其中是名称或序号值提醒，返回单个对象。

span.span: Use Reminders(), where is the name or ordinal value of the reminder, to return a single object.

para.span: 使用提醒创建新的 Microsoft Outlook 项目时，将以编程方式创建提醒。

span.span: Reminders are created programmatically when a new Microsoft Outlook item is created with a reminder.

para.span: 例如，提醒时创建创建对象和AppointmentItem对象的属性设置为True。

span.span: For example, a reminder is created when an object is created and the AppointmentItem object's property is set to True.
